group_1.textRight: We got a traitor in our group. We're not just gonna@let her live, are we?

group_1.textLeft: ...Do you know what Sakuya's reasoning was?

group_1.textRight: Supposedly, she was tryin' to stop you from@crossing a line...
Point is, though, it's not like she doesn't have@her own body count.
She's killed one of her own buddies before.
If all we give her is a slap on the wrist, she might@keep gettin' in our way.
We gotta set an example for the others.

group_1.textLeft: I've known her for a long time, and I would love to@believe in her...
But this is not something that can simply be@brushed aside...
...For now, I'll keep an eye on her...
It's best to be lenient the first time...
I will...ask Hikaru to monitor her for a while...

group_1.textRight: We don't have the manpower to afford babysittin'@her forever, though.

group_1.textLeft: No, we don't... So, once we've confirmed Sakuya's@true intentions...
If everything turns out to be alright, then...we can@stop watching her right away...
If she really is betraying us...and she chooses to@interfere with our next plan...
When that time comes, I will deal with her myself...
